name: Wonderputt
description:
Award winning Adventure Golf with cows, toads, ski slopes, torpedoes and a sprinkle of alien abduction for good measure.

"Wonderputt is one of those sharp apps you just have to show everyone" - Touch Arcade

ADVENTURE GOLF LIKE NO OTHER
From the creator of Icycle: On Thin Ice, Damp Gnat takes you on a putting adventure through a diorama of scientific wonder. Experience the innocent joy of miniature golf over a polymorphing world while you discover its secrets and indulge in its animated surprises.

• EASY touch and drag control for simple intuitive play
• UNRAVEL Wonderputt's world of geographic delight on 18 unique holes
• UNLOCK Wonder to enable rainbow collectables for that added layer of challenge
• JUMP to any unlocked hole to practice and hone your skills
• COMPETE and refine your scores in 3 Game Center Leaderboards
• COLLECT all 16 challenging Game Center Achievements
• No IAPs or Adverts, just instant relaxing pleasure

"Ingenious and imaginative level design, with a crisp interface and a great deal of replayability" - Modojo

"That's some seriously wonderful art there, and wait until you see it animated" - Jay is Games

"It's easy to succeed, and really difficult to master. We are left open-mouthed by this one." - E4

AWARDS
• Best Tablet Game Finalist at the Webby Awards 2012
• 2nd Best Mobile Physics Game on Jayisgames 2012
• Best Art Winner at BIG Festival 2012
• Visual Arts Finalist at the IGF 2012
• Visual Arts Finalist at the Develop Awards 2012

Compatible with devices running iOS 8 or later
